sentences.en: A lorry driver can legally work eighty-two hours a week.
sentences.cn: 从法律上讲，货车司机一星期可工作82小时。

sentences.en: As a novel, Nineteen Eighty-four hardly ranks with the greats.
sentences.cn: 作为一部小说，《一九八四》很难被列为杰作。

sentences.en: Azariah the priest with eighty other courageous priests of the Lord followed him in.
sentences.cn: 祭司亚撒利雅率领耶和华勇敢的祭司八十人，跟随他进去。

sentences.en: He carries his eighty years well.
sentences.cn: 真看不出他是八十高龄的老人.

sentences.en: He is eighty, but still hale and hearty.
sentences.cn: 他年已八旬, 但仍老当益壮.

sentences.en: He may be eighty, but he is still lively.
sentences.cn: 他可能已有80岁, 但是仍然充满朝气.

sentences.en: He stands one metre and eighty.
He was over eighty years of age, infirm and totally blind.
sentences.cn: 他八十多岁了,身体虚弱, 双目失明.

sentences.en: The band was incredibly successful in the eighties.
sentences.cn: 这支乐队在80年代红透半边天。

sentences.en: The old man is over eighty.
The poll canvassed the views of almost eighty economists.
sentences.cn: 民意调查征询了将近80位经济学家的意见。

sentences.en: The skin of an eighty-year-old looks substantially different from that of a twenty-year-old.
sentences.cn: 80岁人的皮肤与20岁人的皮肤看起来有天壤之别。

sentences.en: The stadium has been fitted with seating for over eighty thousand spectators.
sentences.cn: 这个体育场配备了8万多个观众座席。

sentences.en: The watch is worth about eighty yuan.
There are scores of people there, maybe eighty or more.
sentences.cn: 那里有好多人, 也许有80个或者更多.

sentences.en: We can get a fair meal for eighty cents.
sentences.cn: 我们花8角钱可吃上一顿不错的饭.

words.tran_cn: 八十的，八十个的；八十岁的

trans.tran_cn: 八十的，八十个的；八十岁的
